3. RHYTHM Disturbances: The patient experienced nonsustained ventricular tachycardia (NSVT) during the onset of STEMI but has been in normal sinus rhythm (NSR) since then. Close monitoring on telemetry is recommended, and beta-blockers may be considered when tolerated.
